resources.string: No free themes available under this listing
How do I get my theme certified?

- Make sure your theme does not produce any FCs.

- Make sure all text is visible.
No dark text on dark backgrounds or white text on white backgrounds.

- Make sure all quick settings tiles are themed.
This area is very important and must be themed along with the brightness slider and qs editor.

- SmartBar and Fling need to be fully themed.
If your theme is basic than you can leave Smartbar alone.
If you do decide to theme the navbar and have the basic 'back/home/recents' themed then you must theme the rest. Theming only the 3 and not the rest looks tacky. Go big or go home!

- Make sure Settings and 'Dirty Tweaks' is fully themed.
If you're tinting icons then make sure is tinted. If you're including your own drawables than make sure all drawables match your theme.

- Complete the form below and link to it in our G+ community.
Where do I find the framework and apks that I need to theme?

No need to hunt down apks or waste hours decompiling them. We\'ve made it really easy for you to theme DU. All you need to do is download our \'Themes Resources\' zip and in it you have everything you need. Yup, is that easy!
What happens if my theme is not kept updated?
We will remove any and all themes that are not kept updated. This includes not updating the plugin for your theme and/or not staying up to date with theme resources.
Please make sure you have an active internet connection.

It seems like you're using cellular data.

This app depends on a data connection to load resources and in turn, provide quicker updates.

It's highly recommended that you use WiFi due to a slower connection on cellular which may cause a bad experience and lead to you leaving a bad rating.
A collection of hand picked themes that guarantee a good user experience
Some themes are janky and instead of complaining or chasing themers to get things done, we\'ve decided to celebrate what we have!
Do you got questions about getting certified?
Check our built in FAQ and get started!
Enjoy the app, make sure to check for themes often and always #StayDirty
